source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_00<tab>Lyulf, a farmer at the Swiftperch settlement, needs your assistance with another part of his restoration scheme.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_00<tab>An der Tölpelturm-Siedlung denkt Lyulf daran, Dodos zu züchten, um die leeren Mägen der armen Bauern mit reichlich Vogelfleisch zu füllen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_01<tab>To help Lyulf begin his dodo-raising endeavor, seek out the dodo nests scattered throughout the Flock and gather three fertilized eggs.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_01<tab>Für seine Dodo-Zucht braucht Lyulf drei befruchtete Dodo-Eier, die du aus Dodo-Nestern im Nistgebiet der Dodos holen sollst.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_02<tab>You have gathered three fertilized dodo eggs. Return to Swiftperch and deliver them to the waiting Lyulf.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast drei Dodo-Eier gesammelt. Bring sie zu Lyulf an der Tölpelturm-Siedlung.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_03<tab>Ready now to begin raising dodos in earnest, Lyulf is giddy with the thought of restoring Swiftperch to its former heights of agricultural glory. You can only hope that the eggs you acquired for the farmer will help contribute to the salvation of this Calamity-ravaged land.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_SEQ_03<tab>Wenn es Lyulf gelingt, die Dodo-Eier auszubrüten, kann er damit eine Zucht aufbauen, die auf lange Sicht die Versorgungslage der ärmlichen Siedlung stark verbessern wird.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_TODO_00<tab>Gather fertilized eggs from dodo nests.
TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the dodo eggs to Lyulf at Swiftperch.

TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_1<tab>All these wild dodos you see about the place were actually once domesticated birds, bred by my father. They broke loose during the chaos of the Calamity and gradually became the feral, ill-tempered creatures we now do our best to avoid.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_1<tab>Die fetten Dodos, die hier in der Gegend leben, stammen alle von Dodos ab, die mein Vater früher gezüchtet hat. Einige sind davongelaufen und haben sich an das Leben in der Wildnis gewöhnt.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_2<tab>But if I am to restore Swiftperch to the very same settlement it was when my father was alive, then I must also try my hand at dodo-raising. And, as you have likely surmised, I shall require your adventurer's resourcefulness in this endeavor.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_2<tab>Mir liegt viel daran, dass es hier wieder wie früher wird. Deshalb will ich ausprobieren, ob ich nicht auch ein Händchen für Dodos habe, wie mein Vater!

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_3<tab>For the initial stage of my dodo-rearing enterprise, I need you to head into the Flock and seek out dodo nests. You'll be looking for fertilized eggs─three of them should do nicely for now.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_3<tab>Wenn du mir dabei helfen möchtest, dann suche bitte im Nistgebiet der Dodos nach ihren Nestern und stibitze drei befruchtete Dodo-Eier. Damit werde ich dann eine neue Zucht aufbauen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_4<tab>But pray be careful when liberating the eggs. The adult dodos will not take kindly to an intruder making off with their offspring!
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_4<tab>Natürlich sehen die Elterntiere es gar nicht gern, wenn man ihren Nestern zu nah kommt, also sei schön leise und vorsichtig!

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_11<tab>With three eggs, I should be able to experiment with breeding. Success or failure is not terribly important─to begin with, I mean only to gain some practical experience with the birds.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_11<tab>Drei Dodo-Eier reichen, um erste Erfahrungen in der Dodo-Zucht zu sammeln. Es muss mir ja erst mal gelingen, die Eier auszubrüten.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_12<tab>Yes, you did exceptionally well in selecting only fertilized eggs! Now that I consider it, I'm not entirely sure how you managed to tell... In any case, I must raise the naturally aggressive dodo from the egg if I am to have any chance of surviving the breeding process.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_12<tab>Ah, was für Prachteier! Perfekt! Daraus werden niedliche, zahme Dodos schlüpfen. Bei ausgewachsenen Dodos hingegen würde ich mir eine blutige Nase holen.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_13<tab>Apart from encouraging a more docile behavior while the bird is but a chick, it is imperative that I remove the gland that produces that infamous poisonous breath. My father's notes quite graphically depict the consequences of failing to do so.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_13<tab>Man muss den Dodos nämlich ihre Speicheldrüsen entnehmen, solange sie noch klein sind, damit sie später kein Gift spucken. Das hat mir zumindest mein Vater erzählt.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_14<tab>This really is rather exciting! Every day I take another step closer to my vision of a Swiftperch surrounded by golden fields of wheat and echoing with the calls of plump, waddling dodos!
target: TEXT_SUBSEA108_00405_LYULF_000_14<tab>Ach, ich sehe sie schon vor mir, wohlgenährte Dodos neben goldgelben Weizenfeldern! Das macht Hoffnung auf eine Zukunft ohne Hunger.
